hrep 0.10.0

hrep - Harmony Representations

hrep is an R package that provides methods for representing and manipulating chord sequences. It is currently still under active development, but we plan an official release in 2019.

We recommend you explore the online documentation.

Development notes

  • The integer representation of a given representation must begin at 1 and count upwards with no missing values. 0 can optionally be used to code missing chords (but this is not implemented here).
